name: Medium Grey Figma Rulers for Dark Reader
description: Meant to darken the blindingly bright white rulers on figma when used in conjunction with the Dark Reader addon. It works fine on its own as well, and especially well with the Dark Figma style by LTL.

user.name: Lillies
user.about: all donations go towards maintaining irowiki.org

additional_info: May require turning style on/off or refreshing the page to apply properly.
